statements: DELETE FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND product_id = 200
DELETE FROM supply_chain_info WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND product_id = 200;
DELETE FROM supply_chain_info WHERE delivery_date < '2023-01-01' AND quantity >= 50;
DELETE FROM supply_chain_nodes WHERE node_id = 5 AND node_name = 'Warehouse B';
DELETE FROM supply_chain_relationships WHERE relationship_id = 10 AND child_node_id = 7;
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE quantity < 10 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
